title:
20j02 - Application
of exemption when same employer operates more than one establishment.
text:
The
weeks taken under these exemptions are applicable on an establishment basis,
and an employee may be subject to an exemption in each establishment in which
he works, even though the establishments are operated by a single employer.
html: The weeks taken under these exemptions are applicable on an establishment basis, and an employee may be subject to an exemption in each establishment in which he works, even though the establishments are operated by a single employer.
